name: Capital Ring link to King George V DLR

ai.summary: A very short, easy urban segment of the Capital Ring near the King George V DLR in the UK. Just 0.5 km, ideal for a quick stroll or a gentle leg-stretch between transit stops.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly paved paths and sidewalks with light urban surroundings. Mostly flat with occasional parkland stretches along a city-side route.
ai.safety_notes: Urban hike safety: stay aware of traffic and crossings, keep to sidewalks, watch for cyclists and roadworks. Weather can change quickly; bring a light layer and rain protection. Keep personal belongings secure and inform someone of your plan if you are alone.
recommended_gear: Phone with map or offline directions
ai.best_seasons: Year-round; best in spring and autumn for milder weather and daylight
